mapper.select:
SELECT a.name,t1.c3, t2.c4c5 FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) c3, LAN_ID FROM mkt_campaign WHERE REGION_FLG = 'C3'
GROUP BY LAN_ID ) t1 ON a.area_id = t1.LAN_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) c4c5, LAN_ID FROM mkt_campaign WHERE REGION_FLG IN ('C4','C5')
GROUP BY LAN_ID ) t2 ON a.area_id = t2.LAN_ID WHERE a.area_level = '1' GROUP BY a.name

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mkt_campaign WHERE REGION_FLG = 'C2' ) C2, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mkt_campaign WHERE REGION_FLG = 'C3' ) C3, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mkt_campaign WHERE REGION_FLG IN ('C4','C5') ) C4, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mkt_campaign WHERE MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR NOT LIKE CONCAT('%MKT%')) C1,
COUNT(1) SUM FROM mkt_campaign WHERE 1 = 1
select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID from mkt_campaign where MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE = #{map.mktCampaignType} AND STATUS_CD IN (2002, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2010) group by INIT_ID
